pkgmetadata.longdescription: Political Data Interface in R // This package provides easy access to various political data APIs directly from R. For example, you can access Google Civic Information API https://developers.google.com/civic-information/ or Sunlight Congress API https://sunlightlabs.github.io/congress/ for US Congress data, and POPONG API http://data.popong.com/ for South Korea National Assembly data.
